title: The Art of Deep Frying
itunes:title: The Art of Deep Frying
description:
In this episode, Bobby and Sophie get to the bottom of the fryer basket, and cover everything you want to know about “The Art of Deep Frying”. First, Bobby outlines all of the various techniques used by different cultures. Then, together, they head to the kitchen to make and eat Fritto Misto! 

For more information on “Always Hungry”, follow the hosts on Instagram here: 

Bobby Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
